title: AHOYBRAUSE
author: AHOYBRAUSE
created_time: February 18, 2023, 07:37:43 PMLast edit: February 20, 2023, 04:36:56 AM by AHOYBRAUSE
content: Hello community.Since it's carnival season and I have participated in a bunch of giveaways in the past weeks I have decided to make a small giveaway myself.The lucky winner will get the “grand small price” of 11.11$ in BTC.No need to post the wallet right now. Just the winner at the end should post the address here so I can send the price.How will the winner be chosen? Guess the $ amount of my daily reload at Stake. Closest guess will win. Hint, the amount is between 2.00-6.00$ .First answer with correct pick wins, 1 pick per user. If 2 or more members have the same gap to the right amount the price will be split. I have made a screenshot and if some DT member wants to be the judge I can send it to him/her.The giveaway will run until February 23rd , 11:11pm GMT +9Only users with accounts of min 25 merit and 6 month history please.Note: my reload is set until next Saturday, so it will stay the same over the week, in case somebody wants to check. The $ amount won't change over the week.EDIT: I edited that the price will only be in BTC, thanks to CoinEraser for the hint that ALTs are not allowed.

comments.author: NeuroticFish
comments.body: I'll guess: 4.98$OP, maybe you'll state how many digits after the decimal point are allowed.Thanks for the raffle!

comments.author: AHOYBRAUSE
comments.body: Quote from: NeuroticFish on February 18, 2023, 08:12:36 PMI'll guess: 4.98$OP, maybe you'll state how many digits after the decimal point are allowed.Thanks for the raffle!2 digits after the decimal point, thats why I wrote 2.00 - 6.00$   . But maybe I that was no clear enough. Thank you!

comments.body: Nice giveaway, I'm in of course and my prediction is 4,11 USD. Helau.

comments.body: My guess: $4,44Thanks AHOYBRAUSE for this contest! I wish all participants good luck!  As a side note, I would remove LTC and XRP. That is not allowed here, only BTC. Otherwise this competition could be deleted.

comments.author: LoyceV
comments.body: I assume casinos don't like giving away money, so it will be in the lower range. You've been very specific about elevens, so my guess is: $2.11.

comments.author: Dewi Aries
comments.body: I recently had a discussion with this user and he is on Platinum 4 or above because he has a VIP hostrecently I also reached Platinum 2 and my reload bonus is $4.7 so obviously he got more than meI'm guessing it is $5.55  or equivalent ($11.11 : 2 = $5.55 )

comments.author: AHOYBRAUSE
comments.body: Quote from: Dewi Aries on February 19, 2023, 08:56:40 AMI recently had a discussion with this user and he is on Platinum 4 or above because he has a VIP hostrecently I also reached Platinum 2 and my reload bonus is $4.7 so obviously he got more than meI'm guessing it is $5.55  or equivalent ($11.11 : 2 = $5.55 )   Well the 11s have a different meaning though  .At November 11 at 11:11am it's the beginning of carnival season.

comments.author: bullrun2024bro
comments.body: Pretty interesting raffle, Alaaf and Helau my friend. Hope you're having an amazing carnival season.I would like to pick $4.77, if that's not taken already.Thanks a lot in advance for hosting this and good luck to everyone else of course. Quote from: AHOYBRAUSE on February 19, 2023, 10:45:51 AMAt November 11 at 11:11am it's the beginning of carnival season.  Looks like people who don't live in German-speaking countries or grew up here don't know that on November 11 at 11:11 the best time of the year starts.
